amendment.description: To provide access to grocery delivery for homebound seniors and individuals with disabilities eligible for supplemental nutrition assistance benefits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 992 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 992 proposed by Senator Stabenow for Senator Franken.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 992 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 992 proposed by Senator Stabenow for Senator Franken.
